outcome: The Military Pragmatists announce temporary emergency government, suppressing dissent.

events.description: Military Pragmatists declare martial law as a temporary measure to ensure stability amid BCI issues.
Security forces initiate covert operations targeting protest leaders to quell dissent.
Reports emerge of clandestine detentions and interrogations of dissenting voices under martial law.
In public speeches, military leaders stress their commitment to protecting the nation and restoring order.
